entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
